title: frank600
author: frank600
content: Hello,I start one more attempt to sell my coin.Unfortunately, a previous attempt failed. Because the contact with the buyer is suddenly broken.So I try again. Before I devalue and redeem this. The coin is from 2011, and I bought it myself directly, from the manufacturer.The coin is in very good condition.And of course still loaded.My suggested price is 1.2 BTCI am from Germany.https://imgur.com/a/I4IdCE1Greetings,Frank

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Happy to help with escrow, reshipping, auction, sale https://mempool.space/address/1CA5dTV7pgaT1kxbkrhKV9NdN8BffYwZgH

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: With such a valuable item it might be worthwile to connect with one of our trustworthy escrows in the US and consider to deliver in person.Nice coin, maybe try posting some less blurry pictures, though. Peeling is a sin and as far as I know in conflict with the Geneva convention. Don't do it.  Edit: MJ was quicker. I can recommend his escrow services.

comments.author: frank600
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on October 05, 2023, 01:26:04 PMWith such a valuable item it might be worthwile to connect with one of our trustworthy escrows in the US and consider to deliver in person.Nice coin, maybe try posting some less blurry pictures, though. Peeling is a sin and as far as I know in conflict with the Geneva convention. Don't do it.  Edit: MJ was quicker. I can recommend his escrow services.Hello,okay, a new try with better pictures.https://imgur.com/a/TDXpTYiIf more or even better pictures are desired. No problem.

comments.author: frank600
comments.body: The coin is sold.Thanks to minerjones for the support.
